cause.description:
Please check out this Site for more info...and a Reality Check!!! http://members.aol.com/sixunleash/DoggieInTheWindow.html
If nothing else can move you...Read the story at the below link.
http://www.canadanopuppymills.com/howmuchisthatdoggie.htm
This deals with a specific breed, but it goes for all!!!! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cJueekvhRDI&eurl=http://widget-44.slide.com/widgets/sf.swf
1. Animals Should Be Saved
2. Puppy Mills need to be shut down!!!
3. Charges should be brought about!!!
cause.mission: To End this Inhumane Treatment of Animals
cause.name: Puppy Mills Must Go!
